H0.text: The Colorado beetle attacks what crop. Potato

H1.text: The Colorado beetle attacks what crop. Corn

H2.text: The Colorado beetle attacks what crop. Wheat

H3.text: The Colorado beetle attacks what crop. Spud

A4.text: The Colorado potato beetle is a beetle known for being a major pest of potato crops.

A5.text: Colorado potato beetles pose significant dangers to potatoes, which are a quintessential agricultural crop.
